name: LABORON
description:
A third-person Sci-Fi action game I've made to test out Godot in 3D.

It's a prototype but maybe when I will have time I will extend it.

I hope you'll enjoy it !

Warning :

Due to the fact that it is in early development, I did not put graphics settings, so they are high by default and require a powerful enough PC.

Controls :

Mouse + Z Q S D
